author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَيْ رَبِّ أَسْئَلُكَ بِذِكْركَ الَّذِيْ بِهِ بُعِثَتِ المُمْكِنَاتُ وَاسْتَضَائَتِ الوُجُوهُ بِأَنْ لا تُخَيِّبَنِيْ عَمَّا عِنْدَكَ ثُمَّ أَدْخِلْنِيْ بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِي ظِلِّكَ المَمْدُودِ، أَيْ رَبِّ فَاجْعَلْ رَجَائِي أ
translation: I beseech Thee, O my Lord, by that Remembrance of Thee through which all things have been raised to life, and through which all faces have been made to shine, not to frustrate the hopes I have set on the things Thou dost possess. Cause me, then, by Thy mercy, to enter beneath Thy shadow that shadoweth all things.
